content:
LoadedEventHandler Delegate

Definition

Represents the method that will handle the Loaded event of the DesignSurface class. This class cannot be inherited.

In this Article

public delegate void LoadedEventHandler(object sender, LoadedEventArgs e);
Inheritance
Object
System.Delegate
LoadedEventHandler

Remarks

When you create a LoadedEventHandler delegate, you identify a method to handle the event. To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. For more information about event handler delegates, see NIB: Events and Delegates.
